message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of something a bit more budget-friendly. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to consider a price of $127?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $128. It's my final offer. If you're interested, I'm willing to make a deal.
I'm still not sure if this is the best deal for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $129?
I'm not willing to meet you halfway at $129. I'll give you a final offer: $130. This is my absolute lowest price. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider selling to someone else.
I'm not willing to go above $129. I think that's a fair price for the product. I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
